name: Super Golden Speedster 3D
description:
Made over the weekend with Godot Engine.

CONTROLS:

Menu: ESC / Start

Move: WASD / Left Stick

Camera: Arrow Keys / Right Stick / LT & RT (Extra Day Version also has mouselook)

Jump: Space / A

Boost: Shift / X

Stomp: F / B


Click here to view the source code. 

I really like this concept, so I plan to flesh this out more into a (probably still short but) polishes experience. That version will be a separate thing. But for now I'm taking a break from development for a couple days, I've not been sleeping enough.
